channel.title: programming on S. Sharma's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in programming on S. Sharma's Blog

item.title: SocialFinder
item.description: As part of the new year, I want to explicitly state the projects I’m working on and provide updates on them more frequently. Currently, I’m working on a project that I’ve dubbed “SocialFinder”, which is a tool to help find people on the Internet my scraping the Web for social media profiles, news stories, articles, court records, and more. Tomorrow, I hope to provide a more detailed description of what the project is, the motivation behind it, and (maybe) provide a deadline of when the first version of the project should be expected to be completed.
